txt.en: 'No more walking alone at the outskirts of the Old Forest. My thanks!'
'I thought I was done for. No more wandering near this forest at dusk for me. Thank you!'
'Thanks for freeing me. Now you're coming with me!'
'Bet you didn't expect this!'
'Now you're in trouble!'
Find the scout at the mission entrance
'This is the best kind of luck!'
'I am so grateful you happened by here. Thank you.'
Make your way back to the entrance of the mission
'I thought I'd never see light again. You saved me!'
'I shall not walk that way again. I am in your debt.'
'I will make haste from this place.'
'Mercy, I thought I would not survive. Thank you. I'll be safe.'

Spiders toil in the shadow of the Old Forest and entrap any living thing they can find. These corrupt creatures are a menace and must be stopped, but worse, folk have gone missing and might be food for the creatures if we cannot free them. Search the woods for any potential captives that the spiders may have.
Victim rescued ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
PLACEHOLDER - DNT
Free spider victims in the Nettinglade ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'I cannot thank you enough. I'll find my way from here.'
Mission: The Nettinglade
'I had thought these woods safer. I will be cautious as I leave. Thank you.'
'That could have been a frightful end for some. Fortune smiles that you were here to assist, [placeholder]. Let us return.'
'I know not what happened, but I am glad you came to help.'
